properties.name: title
properties.description: The title of the selector's input box

properties.name: items
properties.description: The items to display (array of items).

properties.name: defaultItems
properties.description: Which items to display by default, example ["2","Apple"] (if items.length is 2 for instance)

properties.name: theme
properties.description: Android only - theme color, 'light' or 'dark'.Default: light

properties.name: wrapWheelText
properties.description: Whether to have the wheels 'wrap' (Android only)Default: false
